statement.p: In the model \displaystyle{A}={180.2}{e}^{{{0.0241}{t}}} what is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements.

solution.p: The percent increase/decrease is calculated from \displaystyle{e}^{{0.0241}}\approx{1.024392752044}. Because this is bigger than 1, this is a percent increase and the result is \displaystyle{1.024392752044}-{1}={0.024392752044033}\approx{0.0244} and the percent is 2.44.
We round to 3 significant digits because the measurement (exponent) had 3 significant digits.
